Container.Name: moonlight-web
Container.Overview:
Moonlight Web Stream enables browser-based game streaming through your Sunshine host.
SETUP: 1. Set SERVER_IP to your Unraid server's LAN IP (for example, 192.168.1.50). 2. Leave network mode as "host" for low latency. 3. Set WEB_PORT to the same port used in config.json.

Config.Name: Server IP
Config.Description: Replace with your Unraid server's LAN IP. Used for WebRTC NAT 1:1 mapping.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Port used for web server binding (host networking only)

Config.Name: Pair Device Name
Config.Description: Device name used when pairing Moonlight to Sunshine

Config.Name: Config Folder
Config.Description: Configuration folder for config.json and data
